parameters.description_en: left.fq file (or single.fq)
parameters.description_cn: left.fq file (or single.fq)

parameters.description_en: right.fq file (actually optional, but highly recommended)
parameters.description_cn: right.fq file (actually optional, but highly recommended)

parameters.description_en: file containing list of targeted samples (with format: sample_name(tab)/path/to/left.fq(tab)/path/to/right.fq and for single-end reads, exclude the 2nd read path. )
parameters.description_cn: file containing list of targeted samples (with format: sample_name(tab)/path/to/left.fq(tab)/path/to/right.fq and for single-end reads, exclude the 2nd read path. )

parameters.description_en: Chimeric.out.junction file
parameters.description_cn: Chimeric.out.junction file

parameters.description_en: directory containing genome lib
parameters.description_cn: directory containing genome lib

parameters.description_en: number of threads for running STAR (default: 4)
parameters.description_cn: number of threads for running STAR (default: 4)

parameters.description_en: output directory  (default: STAR-Fusion_outdir)
parameters.description_cn: output directory  (default: STAR-Fusion_outdir)

parameters.description_en: maximum distance between mates  (also used for the maximum intron length value)  default:  100000
parameters.description_cn: maximum distance between mates  (also used for the maximum intron length value)  default:  100000

parameters.description_en: have STAR sort resulting bam file by coordinate
parameters.description_cn: have STAR sort resulting bam file by coordinate

parameters.description_en: num GB of RAM, default:  40G
parameters.description_cn: num GB of RAM, default:  40G

parameters.description_en: /path/to/STAR  (default: uses STAR found in PATH setting).
parameters.description_cn: /path/to/STAR  (default: uses STAR found in PATH setting).

parameters.description_en: stop after running STAR aligner (essentially just generating the Chimeric.out.junction file)
parameters.description_cn: stop after running STAR aligner (essentially just generating the Chimeric.out.junction file)

parameters.description_en: minimum number of bases in the overlap (default: 12)
parameters.description_cn: minimum number of bases in the overlap (default: 12)

parameters.description_en: the max proportion of mismatches in the overlap (default: 0.1)
parameters.description_cn: the max proportion of mismatches in the overlap (default: 0.1)

parameters.description_en: the score range for multi-mapping chimeras below the best chimeric score. (default: 10)
parameters.description_cn: the score range for multi-mapping chimeras below the best chimeric score. (default: 10)

parameters.description_en: maximum number of multi-alignments for the chimera (default: 10)
parameters.description_cn: maximum number of multi-alignments for the chimera (default: 10)

parameters.description_en: to trigger chimeric detection, the drop in the best non-chimeric alignment score with respect to the read length has to be smaller than this value (default: 10)
parameters.description_cn: to trigger chimeric detection, the drop in the best non-chimeric alignment score with respect to the read length has to be smaller than this value (default: 10)

parameters.description_en: min pct of multimapping reads that should map to 2 genes (avoids multimapping reads that lack specificity) value must be between [1,100] (default: 50)
parameters.description_cn: min pct of multimapping reads that should map to 2 genes (avoids multimapping reads that lack specificity) value must be between [1,100] (default: 50)

parameters.description_en: do not filter predictions. (stops execution prior to the filtering stage).
parameters.description_cn: do not filter predictions. (stops execution prior to the filtering stage).

parameters.description_en: passed to STAR (very useful if local disks are faster than network disks)
parameters.description_cn: passed to STAR (very useful if local disks are faster than network disks)

parameters.description_en: minimum number of junction-spanning reads required. Default: 1
parameters.description_cn: minimum number of junction-spanning reads required. Default: 1

parameters.description_en: minimum fusion support = ( # junction_reads + # spanning_frags ) Default: 2
parameters.description_cn: minimum fusion support = ( # junction_reads + # spanning_frags ) Default: 2

parameters.description_en: require long double anchor support for split reads when no spanning frags are found (default: 1)
parameters.description_cn: require long double anchor support for split reads when no spanning frags are found (default: 1)

parameters.description_en: maximum number of partners allowed for a given fusion. Default: 10
parameters.description_cn: maximum number of partners allowed for a given fusion. Default: 10

parameters.description_en: for promiscuous fusions, those with less than this support of the dominant scoring pair are filtered prior to applying the max_promiscuity filter.(default: 20)
parameters.description_cn: for promiscuous fusions, those with less than this support of the dominant scoring pair are filtered prior to applying the max_promiscuity filter.(default: 20)

parameters.description_en: default: 5 (non-ref junctions within 5 are merged into single calls)
parameters.description_cn: default: 5 (non-ref junctions within 5 are merged into single calls)

parameters.description_en: default: 3  (minimum of 3 junction reads required if breakpoint lacks involvement of only reference junctions)
parameters.description_cn: default: 3  (minimum of 3 junction reads required if breakpoint lacks involvement of only reference junctions)

parameters.description_en: minimum number of rna-seq fragments required as fusion evidence if there are no junction reads (default: 5)
parameters.description_cn: minimum number of rna-seq fragments required as fusion evidence if there are no junction reads (default: 5)

parameters.description_en: default: 10  (10 % of the dominant isoform junction support)
parameters.description_cn: default: 10  (10 % of the dominant isoform junction support)

parameters.description_en: minimum FFPM (fusion fragments per million rna-seq frags)  (default: 0.1)
parameters.description_cn: minimum FFPM (fusion fragments per million rna-seq frags)  (default: 0.1)

parameters.description_en: do not remove duplicate reads
parameters.description_cn: do not remove duplicate reads

parameters.description_en: exclude filtering of fusion predictions based on annotations
parameters.description_cn: exclude filtering of fusion predictions based on annotations

parameters.description_en: explore impact of fusions on coding sequences
parameters.description_cn: explore impact of fusions on coding sequences

parameters.description_en: retrieves the fusion supporting reads from the fastq files
parameters.description_cn: retrieves the fusion supporting reads from the fastq files

parameters.description_en: include FusionInspector, options：'inspect' - considers only StarFusion-identified fusion reads in context of identified fusions (fast)，'validate' - examines all reads, recovers evidence, computes fusion allele fractions (slow)
parameters.description_cn: include FusionInspector, options：'inspect' - considers only StarFusion-identified fusion reads in context of identified fusions (fast)，'validate' - examines all reads, recovers evidence, computes fusion allele fractions (slow)

parameters.description_en: attempt to reconstruct fusion transcripts using Trinity de novo assembly (requires --FusionInspector)
parameters.description_cn: attempt to reconstruct fusion transcripts using Trinity de novo assembly (requires --FusionInspector)

parameters.description_en: use shared memory among multiple processes for the STAR alignment step
parameters.description_cn: use shared memory among multiple processes for the STAR alignment step

parameters.description_en: runs STAR to load the genome index into shared RAM, then exits.
parameters.description_cn: runs STAR to load the genome index into shared RAM, then exits.

parameters.description_en: removes genome from shared RAM and exits.
parameters.description_cn: removes genome from shared RAM and exits.

parameters.description_en: file for temporary files (default: /tmp)
parameters.description_cn: file for temporary files (default: /tmp)

parameters.description_en: verbosity (default: 2, max=2)
parameters.description_cn: verbosity (default: 2, max=2)
